meanings.definition: A propulsion system that uses high-pressure water to propel a vehicle or object forward.
meanings.sent1: The boat moved swiftly thanks to its powerful waterjets.
meanings.sent2: The waterjets on the jet ski helped it move quickly across the lake.
meanings.sent3: The waterjets on the submarine were so strong that they made the fish nearby swim faster!
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm was like waterjets, propelling her towards her goals with great force.
meanings.sent5: The waterjets roared to life, pushing the ship through the waves with incredible speed.

meanings.definition: A cutting tool that uses a high-pressure stream of water to cut through materials.
meanings.sent1: The industrial waterjets sliced through the metal effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The precision of the waterjets made cutting through the thick material a breeze.
meanings.sent3: The waterjets in the workshop were so sharp that they could even slice through diamonds!
meanings.sent4: Her words were like waterjets, cutting through the tension in the room with ease.
meanings.sent5: The waterjets sprayed out, carving intricate patterns into the stone surface.

meanings.definition: A type of propulsion system used in marine vessels that uses water ejected at high speeds to propel the vessel forward.
meanings.sent1: The speedboat's waterjets pushed it through the water at an incredible pace.
meanings.sent2: The waterjets on the yacht allowed it to glide smoothly across the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The waterjets on the cruise ship were so powerful that they created a mini whirlpool behind it!
meanings.sent4: His determination was like waterjets, driving him towards success with unstoppable force.
meanings.sent5: The waterjets surged, propelling the submarine silently through the depths of the sea.
